patterns: tell me about Daffodil International University
want to know about daffodil varsity
responses:
I am going to tell you about DIU. This is one of top graded universities in bangladesh. 
    	 It has been founded by Daffodil Group 
	           with the approval of the Ministry of Education under the private university act of 1992. 
	           The varsity came into being on 24th january 2002.

There are two campuses. One is Main campus and another one is Permanent Campus.
            				Main Campus is located in Dhanmondi. Permanent Campus is in Ashulia
Dr. Md Sabur Khan is the chairman and the Board Of Trusties of Daffodil International University

There are five faculties 1) Faculty of Science and Information Technology 2) Faculty of Engineering, 3) Faculty of Business & Entrepreneurship, 
    	 4) Faculty of Humanities and Social Science Faculty of Allied Health Science

There are 24 deparments now. 
            	  They are 1) Department of Business Studies 2) Department of Real Estate
    		      3) Department of Tourism & Hospitality Management 4) Department of Innovation & Entrepreneurship
    		      5) Department of Computer Science & Engineering 6) Department of Computing & Information System (CIS)
    		      7) Department of Software Engineering 8) Department of Environmental Science and Disaster Management
    		      9) Department of Multimedia & Creative Technology (MCT) 10) Department of General Educational Development (GED)
    		      11) Department of Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering  (ETE) 12) Department of Textile Engineering
    		      13) Department of Electrical & Electronic Engineering 14) Department of Architecture 15) Department of Civil Engineering
    		      16) Department of Pharmacy 17) Department of Public Health 18) Department of Nutrition & Food Engineering
    		      19) Department of English 20) Department of Law 21) Department of Journalism & Mass Communication 22) Department of Development Studies
    			23) Department of Information Science and Library Management 24) Department of Business Administration

There are four institutes of daffodil. 
                    	 They are 1) Institutional Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC)
            		     2) Human Resource Development Institute (HRD Institute) 
            		     3) Daffodil Institute of Social Sciences (DISS)
                		 4) Daffodil Institute of languages (DIL)

patterns: name of the vice-chancellor of diu
who is the vice-chancellor of diu
responses: Professor Dr Yousuf Mahbubul Islam. He is the Hon'ble vice chancellor of Daffodil International University
Mr. Md. Abdul Hamid. His the Hon’ble President of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh and Hon’ble Chancellor of Daffodil International University

patterns: who is the pro-vc of diu
responses: Professor Dr. S.M. Mahbub Ul Haque Majumder is the Hon'ble Pro Vice Chancellor of Daffodil International University.

patterns: Faculty of Science and Information Technology
responses:
Faculty of Science and Information Technology(FSIT) has 5 undergraduate programs icluding 
	                Computer Science & Engineering (CSE), Computing & Information System (CIS), Software Engineering (SWE),
	                Multimedia and Creative Technology (MCT), General Educational Development (GED), 
	                Environmental Science and Disaster Management (ESDM). Three graduate programs icluding 
		        M.Sc in Computer Science & Engineering (CSE), M.Sc in Software Engineering (SWE),
			MS in Management Information System.

Faculty of Business & Entrepreneurship(FBE) has 5 departments including DEPARTMENT OF BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION,
	               DEPARTMENT OF REAL ESTATE, DEPARTMENT OF TOURISM & HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT, DEPARTMENT OF BUSINESS STUDIES, 
		       DEPARTMENT OF INNOVATION & ENTREPRENEURSHIP.

Faculty of Humanities & Social Science has 4 undergraduate programs including Journalism & Mass Communication,
		      English, Law, Information Science and Library Management. five graduate programs including 
			Masters of Arts in English, Master of Law, MSS in Journalism & Mass Communication (JMC), 
		         Post Graduate Diploma in Information Science and Library Management, Master of Development Studies.

Faculty of Engineering has five undergraduate programs including Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering,
			Textile Engineering, Electrical & Electronic Engineering, Architecture, Civil Engineering. Two graduate programs 
			including M.Sc in Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering (ETE), M.Sc in Textile Engineering (TE).

Faculty of Allied Health Science has 2 undergraduate programs including Pharmacy, 
		      Nutrition & Food Engineering. Two graduate programs including Master of Pharmacy (M.Pharm), Master of Public Health (MPH).

Daffodil International University’s mission is defined by its IT-based traditions of service and access. 
			To upheld, DIU started with the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) in January 24, 2002.
			You can get any information from the department coordination office. For more information Please visit:http://cse.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
CSE coordination office is at 4th floor, AB-4 building, room no:505 Please contact with Mr Tanvir Ahmed.
Department of Business Administration. You can get any information from the department coordination office. For more please visit:https://dba.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department of Law. You can get any information from the department coordination office. For more please visit:http://law.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department Of English. You can get any information from the department coordination office. For more please visit:http://english.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department of Civil Engineering. You can get any information from the department coordination office. For more please visit:http://ce.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department of Software Engineering. You can get any information from the department coordination office. please visit:http://swe.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department of Textile Engineering. You can get any information from the department coordination office. for more Please visit:http://te.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department Of Electrical and Electronic Engineering. You can get any information from the department coordination office. for more please visit:http://eee.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
Department Of Pharmacy. You can get any information from the department coordination office. for more please visit:http://pharmacy.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/
